programme.sub-title: Poking a Bush Draws Out a Snake; Let Sleeping Dogs Lie
programme.desc: In retaliation for the arrest of Shōrei and Reishin, the Hong Clan goes on strike, causing half of the imperial government to shut down; Shōrei and Eigetsu rush to finish their report before the official inquiry begins at noon.

programme.title: The Story of Saiunkoku
programme.sub-title: Hiding One's Head but Not One's Bottom
programme.desc: The plot against Shōrei is defeated after she passes a verbal examination before the Emperor and assembles officials with flying colors; Shōrei and Eigetsu's report furnishes evidence against the corrupt Sa Clan official who plotted against them.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Night of Tragedy: The Demon Hand That Tears Through Doors
programme.desc: Stories spread about something preying on children who are alone, and the gang gets scared; especially since their parents will be out for the night; a deadly ghost with a sickle in hand stalks Satsuki and her friends.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Utsushimi: The Soul Stolen by the Mirror!
programme.desc: People all over town begin acting strangely; most of them have been replaced by mirror-world clones of themselves; with Satsuki and Hajime being the last two people in the town who haven't been swapped, they'll have to find a way to end this ghost.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: The Ogre of the Underworld: The Circuits That Lead to Hell
programme.desc: Leo is convinced that there's a ghostly website out there on the internet and is determined to find it, which he does; trapped in the computer, the rest of the gang needs to figure out how to apply old-fashioned exorcism to new technologies.

programme.desc: One of Tails' inventions catches the eye of Professor Dinglehopper, who asks the fox to leave Sonic and become his research assistant.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Aoki and Kimura fight their matches; Kamogawa wants Ippo to train his legs to get flexible muscles so that he can deliver a more powerful punch and beat Volg.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Ippo meets Volg after Volg gets lost; Volg tells Ippo that he boxes so that he can get money for his mother.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: 20 years after a devastating war, an old man and a young boy named Conan live on Remnant Island; one day, Conan finds a girl named Lana on the shore; when Lana is abducted by soldiers, Conan and his grandfather must spring into action.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan travels by plane and sea as he tries to rescue Lana from the clutches of Industria soldiers.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan arrives on a small island and meets Jimsy, a boy who has been living in the wild; as Conan gets to know his new friend, the ship Barracuda offers an opportunity to finally reach Industria.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan and Jimsy attempt to stowaway aboard the Barracuda, but are caught and punished by the ship's captain Dyce; they get to work as the ship heads for Industria.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: The Barracuda finally arrives in Industria and Conan and Jimsy are stunned to find it bleak and deserted; Conan races through the complex searching for Lana.

programme.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
programme.sub-title: The Truth About Innova, and the Return of Memories

programme.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
programme.sub-title: The Last Rune-God: Rayearth, the Lord of Fire

programme.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
programme.sub-title: Showdown! The Magic Knights Versus Zagato
programme.desc: Aboard their robot genes, Luce, Marina and Anemone set out in search of Zagato. Princess Emeraude contacts them and points the way to the castle where she is being held captive.

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
programme.desc: Nadia is angry and dismissive of Jean's friendly offers as she goes to extremes to preach her stand on animal rights.
